name: Dev Mentor Hub
description: Premier developer certification and mentorship platform offering Professional Developer Certification through personalized guidance and real-world projects in AI, Frontend, Full Stack, and Low-Code development. Transform your tech career with hands-on experience and industry-leading mentors.

offers.name: AI Development Certification Program
offers.description: Master AI development with certification, hands-on projects and expert mentorship

offers.name: Frontend Development Certification Program
offers.description: Build modern web applications with React and TypeScript, earn professional certification

offers.name: Full Stack Development Certification Program
offers.description: Master full stack development with certification and real-world projects

offers.name: Low-Code Development Certification Program
offers.description: Learn rapid application development with low-code platforms and get certified
